alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 5:03AM EDT until August 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some secondary roads may be flooded. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood- prone property.
